sourcesContent:
<template>
  <st-modal v-model="show" title="添加评价" width="715px">
    <st-form :form="form" class="course-evaluation-add">
      <a-row class="course-evaluation-add-top">
        <a-col :span="12">
          <st-form-item label="选择门店">
            <a-select style="width: 180px;"></a-select>
          </st-form-item>
          <st-form-item label="课程类型">
            <a-select style="width: 180px;"></a-select>
          </st-form-item>
          <st-form-item label="选择课程" required>
            <a-select style="width: 180px;" show-search></a-select>
          </st-form-item>
          <st-form-item :label="`选择${$c('coach')}`" required>
            <a-select style="width: 180px;"></a-select>
          </st-form-item>
        </a-col>
        <a-col :span="12">
          <st-form-item label="模拟会员头像" required>
            <st-image-upload
              :sizeLimit="5"
              :list="fileList"
              @change="fileChange"
              width="100px"
              height="100px"
              placeholder="上传图片"
              :cropperModal="{
                title: '门店图片裁切',
                cropper: { aspectRatio: 1 / 1 }
              }"
            ></st-image-upload>
          </st-form-item>
          <st-form-item label="模拟会员名称" required class="member-name">
            <a-input></a-input>
          </st-form-item>
        </a-col>
      </a-row>
      <a-row class="mg-t24">
        <a-col :span="8">
          <st-form-item label="整体感受">
            <st-icon
              v-for="i in 5"
              :key="i"
              type="star"
              color="#FF9E33"
            ></st-icon>
          </st-form-item>
        </a-col>
        <a-col :span="8">
          <st-form-item label="课程内容"></st-form-item>
        </a-col>
        <a-col :span="8">
          <st-form-item :label="`${$c('coach')}服务`"></st-form-item>
        </a-col>
      </a-row>
      <st-form-item label="评级内容">
        <st-textarea
          maxlength="500"
          placeholder="这次上课感觉怎么样？"
          :autosize="{
            minRows: 2,
            maxRow: 4
          }"
        ></st-textarea>
      </st-form-item>
      <st-form-item label="评价图片">
        <st-image-upload
          :sizeLimit="5"
          :numLimit="9"
          :list="fileList"
          @change="fileChange"
          width="100px"
          height="100px"
          placeholder="上传图片"
          :cropperModal="{
            title: '门店图片裁切',
            cropper: { aspectRatio: 1 / 1 }
          }"
        ></st-image-upload>
      </st-form-item>
    </st-form>
  </st-modal>
</template>
<script>
import StImageUpload from '@/views/components/image-upload#/image-upload.vue'

export default {
  data() {
    const form = this.$stForm.create()
    return {
      show: false,
      form,
      fileList: []
    }
  },
  components: {
    StImageUpload
  },
  methods: {
    fileChange() {}
  }
}
</script>
